DOC.brief_summary: This phase III , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , multicenter study clinical response fentanyl sublingual spray treatment breakthrough cancer pain . The study medication administer tongue simple spray self-administered patient assist caregiver . Patients titrate effective-dose fentanyl sublingual spray open-label titration period proceed double-blind randomized period randomly receive 7 treatment fentanyl sublingual spray 3 treatment placebo . Patients treat total 6-7 week ( include open-label titration double-blind randomize period ) .
DOC.brief_title: Fentanyl Sublingual Spray Treating Patients With Breakthrough Cancer Pain
DOC.detailed_description: RATIONALE Fentanyl sublingual spray may help relieve breakthrough pain patient receive opioids cancer pain . OBJECTIVES Primary - Determine efficacy safety fentanyl sublingual spray treatment breakthrough cancer pain patient around-the-clock opioids persistent cancer pain . Secondary - Evaluate safety fentanyl sublingual spray opioid-tolerant patient . - Assess patient 's satisfaction treatment medication .
DOC.criteria: Male female , ≥ 18 year age . Diagnosis cancer . Opioidtolerant . Subjects opioid tolerant take ≥ 60 mg oral morphine/day , least 25 μg transdermal fentanyl/hour , least 30 mg oxycodone daily , least 8 mg oral hydromorphone daily equianalgesic dose another opioid week longer cancerrelated pain . Experienced persistent pain related cancer treatment moderate less intensity 24 hour prior assessment verbal rating scale Screening Visit . Over previous 7 day , subject experience , average , 1 4 breakthrough cancer pain episode per day usually least partially control supplemental medication least 5 mg immediaterelease morphine equivalent shortacting opioid ( eg , oxycodone , hydrocodone , codeine acetaminophen ) . Able evaluate record pain relief , assess medication performance set time dose , record AEs , record use study drug supplemental medication electronic diary ( caregiver may provide subject medication , help mechanic handle electronic diary permit record information electronic diary ) . Able willing give inform consent . Women childbearing potential ) negative serum pregnancy test , b ) breastfeed c ) agree practice reliable form contraception . Intolerance opioids fentanyl . Current use commercially available oral shortacting fentanyl breakthrough pain . Subjects previously Actiq Fentora permit enrol 7 day washout . Rapidly increasing/uncontrolled pain . A history major organ system impairment disease , Investigator 's his/her designee 's opinion could increase risk associate use opioids . Uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic blood pressure { SBP } > 180 mmHg diastolic blood pressure [ DBP ] > 90 mmHg 2 occasion ≥ 6 hour apart ) despite antihypertensive therapy , history hypertensive crisis within past 2 year . A recent history ( ≤ 2 year prior ) transient ischemic attack , neural vascular disease , stroke , cerebral aneurysm . Clinically uncontrolled sleep apnea . Brain metastases sign symptom increase intracranial pressure . Inability assess pain response pain medication reason , include psychiatric disorder , concurrent medical disorder , concomitant therapy . Received investigational study product ( ) ≤ 30 day prior Screening Visit . Painful erythema , oedema ulcer tongue . Use monoamine oxidase ( MAO ) inhibitor within 14 day Screening Visit .
